name: BroadPoint Technologies
description:
BroadPoint is an award-winning business and technology consulting firm that implements Microsoft ERP, CRM, membership, business intelligence, and staff productivity solutions.
Since 2001, BroadPoint has worked with clients in a variety of industries, with a focus on not-for-profits, technology companies, membership associations, health and human services, and professional services companies. We implement software applications and provide ongoing application support, training, status reporting, technology assessments and cloud application management.
As one of the top Microsoft Gold-Certified Dynamics partners in the U.S., we have hundreds of customers across the country that trust BroadPoint’s team of experienced CPAs, MBAs, PMI-certified project managers, technology experts and service professionals. Learn more at www.broadpoint.net.
